subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: Former No. 1 Lindsay Davenport knocked off the world’s current No. 1, Amélie Mauresmo, in straight sets at the Pilot Pen hard-court tournament.
snippet: Former No. 1 Lindsay Davenport knocked off the world’s current No. 1, Amélie Mauresmo, in straight sets at the Pilot Pen hard-court tournament.
